item.title: Experience Help
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

Dear Fellow Moparscapians,

I really want to De-crease the speed of my skilling on my server, it’s quite fast and i really want to slow it down a little bit. I want to make it just 3 Times faster then runescape. So can anybody tell me how to do it, I’ve currently got it set to this.

[code=java] public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        if (lvl >= level) {
            return output;
        }
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
    }
    return 99;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
    int points = 0;
    int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 99;
}[/code]

Thanks,

All Help Is Much Appreciated.

Read full topic
